overview:
Managing Partner Jarne Elleholm

Has more than 20 years experience in the pharmaceutical and life science industries at Vice President and CEO level with a record of achievement in strategic business development, restructuring and driving profitable growth. Jarne has served as CEO for the Biotech company Aresa A/S where he built up the organization and completed an IPO. Prior experience includes European Vice President for Whatman International, a LSE listed company, and CEO for Lundbeck Ltd. UK where he successfully launched several pharmaceutical products. Jarne holds an M.Com from Copenhagen Business School and an MBA from INSEAD.
